data.name: File Under Kingdom
data.detailed_description:
As the new Royal Planner, it is your job to satisfy the needs of the kingdom through clever placement of buildings and land. Each building will generate a resource according to what surrounds it, be it natural or manmade.



Use a combination of buildings to get the most out of the space you have, as your funds can dry up fast, leaving you to sell the land you just developed to buy more.

Once the needs are met you will be shown transcripts from the Council Meetings, where you can see how focusing on one resource over another has altered events and/or forced the king down a particular path.

Features

  • A variety of buildings at your disposal.
  • (Somewhat) Randomly generated land to buy, build on, and sell if needed.
  • Branching story with multiple endings that hinge on what you decide to build.
  • 9 Maps that will test your management skills, see how you compare to the previous Royal Planner.
  • A Freeplay mode if you want a break from the Campaign and just wish to build.
data.about_the_game:
As the new Royal Planner, it is your job to satisfy the needs of the kingdom through clever placement of buildings and land. Each building will generate a resource according to what surrounds it, be it natural or manmade.



Use a combination of buildings to get the most out of the space you have, as your funds can dry up fast, leaving you to sell the land you just developed to buy more.

Once the needs are met you will be shown transcripts from the Council Meetings, where you can see how focusing on one resource over another has altered events and/or forced the king down a particular path.

data.short_description: File Under Kingdom is a mix of city builder, puzzle game, and interactive story. How you build the kingdom will alter events and/or influence the choices of its leaders. Use a variety of buildings to satisfy the kingdom's needs. See if you have what it takes to be the kings new Royal Planner.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 346 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 376 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 395 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: As the story unfolds, players may encounter dialogue scenes referencing torture and/or execution, this is all told via text with no images portraying such scenes. Characters can also be murdered during dialogue scenes which is described in little detail, but splashes of blood can appear on the dialogue page. Swearing/curse words will occasionally pop up throughout the game.
